column4: hello.  I'm wondering if someone could help me with setting up running Ubuntu on my TV.  It works fine on my small monitor but when I put it on my tv the display seems wrong.  I looked at the xorg.0.log and see that it does not like the frequency.
looking for some help if someone is able to assist me... it would be apprecieated
do you have any adapters or anything in between the card and the tv? How is it connected?
have you installed the proprietary drivers? and if so what options do you have in nvidia-settings?
